prompts: Create an ice-type Pokemon with a majestic appearance and a body covered in frosty patterns.
I want a majestic creature that embodies the essence of winter with shimmering blue and white colors.
Generate an elegant, quadrupedal Pokemon that shows strength and grace in a snowy landscape.
Make a mythical ice horse that has a powerful presence and glows with a soft blue light.
Imagine a Pokemon that roams the tundra, showcasing beautiful ice crystals on its body.
Design a legendary Pokemon that can control the snow and ice, with unique features like icy horns.
Show me a Pokemon that represents the spirit of the cold, with striking blue hues and a noble stance.
